statements: DELETE FROM telehealth_studies WHERE patient_id = 100 AND patient_age > 50;
DELETE FROM telehealth_studies WHERE study_id = 1 AND patient_id = 100;
DELETE FROM telehealth_studies WHERE patient_gender = 'M' AND patient_age > 30;
DELETE FROM StudyResults WHERE study_id = 2005 AND patient_id = 1002;
DELETE FROM StudyResults WHERE patient_id = 200 AND study_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM measurements WHERE value IS NULL;
